thread.title: Rex Williamson
thread.title_full: Remitly | Send Money Home reviewed by Rex Williamson

author: Rex Williamson
title: Rex Williamson
text:
Saved a total of $7 over Western Union (Free transfers for a month), AND the recipient got more money too.
This service is outstanding. Customer Service is also extremely fast and very helpful. I will never use another company again to transfer money.
Thank you for providing a very much needed service at extremely affordable rates.
